text: Michael Harradence / March 5, 2024  Horizon Forbidden West Complete Edition is slated to hit the PC on March 21, and Guerrilla Games and Nixxes have today shared the full tech specs to prepare you ahead of release. Related Content – Upcoming PS5 Games 2024: The Best PS5 Games Coming Soon Horizon Forbidden West was originally released for PS5 & PS4 in February 2022, and the PC version will feature a wealth of improvements including support for NVIDIA’s DLSS 3, AMD FSR, upscaling techniques, direct storage, and unlocked frame rate. You can see the full tech specs below.
